title: How to get the seat in Kendriya Vidyalaya - Quora

response.answer_text: KV’s generally have a fixed no. Of seats in each category based on the parents service type(eg. defense, central govt. , state govt., etc). During my time (1994–2007) there were 7 categories. although not sure about now. There are seats present even for businessmen’s kids, but due to the very small pecentage it is almost negligible. Also the purpose of KV is to provide symmetric schooling throughout the year irrspective of the location so that in case of relocation the kids/parents need not take extra stress on covering up syllabus or change in books or uniform. It is ideal for those people who are getting transferred frequently and hence the misconception of defence background requirement. There are other schools like army and airforce where kids of civilians are not given admission. Admission procedure includes form filling and a small interview kind of test. Please check that in the particular school as each KV has its own applicants. Also, with due respect I would like to mention that there are no shortcuts. All the best for your Kid.

usually, the seats were offered on first come first basis.but now, test system came in effect, interview of parents, and i heard of lottery system too (don't know if it's true or not).So, your best deal is to also some permeant teacher of the school were you what to take admission, or some peon from office department (they Handel and know all, trust me).and most importantly, admission for class 1 usually begins in February start to mid of March. so, keep in touch with some KV student, coz it's announced in morning assembly about starting of admission process. P.S. - having a defense background is not so compulsory to take admission in KV.

Now a days kendriya Vidyalayas allow admission of the children's whose parents are not from defense background. Admission forms will be available in the 1st or 2nd week of February. And according to my knowledge admissions are done by First come first get basic. Although my parents are also not from defense background but I had done my all schooling from kendriya Vidyalaya Rohtak, Haryana. At that time they used to take a small test of the applicants ( coutings, ABCD etc). So hurry up to visit the nearest Kendriya Vidyalaya and ask them about the admission procedure and about the admission form availability. Best of luck
